text: Rachel Lee Brand (born May 1, 1973) is an American lawyer, academic, and politician. She was the United States Associate Attorney General from May 22, 2017 until February 20, 2018. She resigned in 2018 to become head of global corporate governance at Walmart. Brand was the first woman to be Associate Attorney General. Brand was an associate professor at Antonin Scalia Law School.washingtonpost.com: Third-highest ranking official at the Justice Department stepping downhttp://www.justice.gov: Associate Attorney General to Leave Justice Department for Private Sector ==References== ==Other websites== * US Department of Justice biography * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Michigan Category:Academics from Michigan Category:Lawyers from Michigan Category:Businesspeople from Michigan Category:Politicians from Iowa Category:Academics from Iowa Category:Lawyers from Iowa Category:Businesspeople from Iowa
title: Rachel Brand
